enchantment.fancyenchantments.gift_of_fi: Deals more damage to enemies on fire, but less damage when you are in water
enchantment.fancyenchantments.pyromaniac: When you would take explosion damage, you will be healed instead
enchantment.fancyenchantments.eater_of_s: The damage increases with Kill Count, but the enemies will not drop exp
enchantment.fancyenchantments.solid_as_a: Increases armor and toughness when holding a shield
enchantment.fancyenchantments.ocean_curr: Increases attack speed, increases more in water
enchantment.fancyenchantments.overflow.d: Killing enemies has a probability of generating a puddle of water at their death location
enchantment.fancyenchantments.fire_disas: Killing enemies has a probability of generating a fire at their death location
enchantment.fancyenchantments.the_fallen: Weapon damage increases with the number of curse enchantments.
enchantment.fancyenchantments.empathy.de: Now you understand how arrows feel...
enchantment.fancyenchantments.rolling_st: Reduces damage taken and causes damage to enemies collided with while sprinting
enchantment.fancyenchantments.blessed_wi: Slightly increases movement speed, increase speed and step height while sprinting
enchantment.fancyenchantments.heavy_blow: Chance to hit a heavy blow
enchantment.fancyenchantments.wind_blade: Increases damage by percentage based on movement speed attribute
